name: Ashley: The Story Of Survival
description: Her life was changed in a few seconds… She has lost everything - parents, home, childhood… Now she has to survive in this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
